question: how many side does this image show nice photo of parotid on with tumor capsule and obvious invasive tumor?
unified_answer: Based on this image, the apparent capsule appears intact.  There is no definitive visual evidence of invasive growth beyond it in this particular section.  While the interface between the mass and surrounding tissue appears somewhat irregular, this alone is not sufficient to diagnose invasive growth. A larger, more comprehensive view of the specimen would be necessary for a definitive assessment.
reformulated_question: This image appears to show a parotid gland with a mass exhibiting a capsule.  Based on the visible features in this 224x224 image, which primarily focuses on the upper left region, are there any visual characteristics suggestive of invasive growth of the mass beyond the apparent capsule?  Describe these characteristics, if present.?
